snippet: MILLS--Reverend Frances Jeanne Melis, October 18, 1942, died February 2, 2016. Beloved mother of Sara and Nicole and grandmother of Henry. Services 11am, Saturday, March 5, Dorset Church, 143 Church Rd., Dorset, VT. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MILLS--Reverend Frances Jeanne Melis, October 18, 1942, died February 2, 2016. Beloved mother of Sara and Nicole and grandmother of Henry. Services 11am, Saturday, March 5, Dorset Church, 143 Church Rd., Dorset, VT. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MILLS, REVEREND FRANCES JEANNE MELIS
